title: 额外植物学打盖亚3崩服
author: an.com
txt_content:
14.08 19:05:13 [服务器] 错误 Exception caught during firing event net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingHurtEvent@66e65ae5:

上面是服务器报错，打盖亚3后出现的，望解决谢谢！
最新版和旧版都会出现
@C似水流年

replies.author: 夕离丶
replies.txt_content: 第一种办法！！！ban盖亚！！！第二种服务端里面的\config\forge.cfg removeErroringEntities和removeErroringTileEntities设置为true....
